subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrik Elias and Zach Parise scored shootout goals in the Devils’ 3-2 victory at Buffalo on Saturday, extending the Sabres’ winless streak to nine games.
snippet: Patrik Elias and Zach Parise scored shootout goals in the Devils’ 3-2 victory at Buffalo on Saturday, extending the Sabres’ winless streak to nine games.
